input.devices

Interface Input

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MouseKeyBoardHandler

    public interface Input
    Interface that specifies the core methods to implement for a generic input handler.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.vecmath.Point3f getPosition()
      Get the position in 3D Cartesian space of a generic device cursor, e.g., for a Wiimote its a X, Y, Z coordinate, for a mouse its the mouse cursor X and Y values, etc.
      boolean isDetecting(java.lang.String inputEvent)
      Test if for a generic input device and specific provided event is occurring, e.g., mouse button or keyboard key is pressed.

    • Method Detail

      • isDetecting

        boolean isDetecting(java.lang.String inputEvent)
        Test if for a generic input device and specific provided event is occurring, e.g., mouse button or keyboard key is pressed.
        Parameters:
        inputEvent - specific provided generic input event, e.g., mouse button pressed, keyboard key press, 3D camera detected movement, etc.
        Returns:
        TRUE if provided input event is occurring, otherwise returns FALSE.

      • getPosition

        javax.vecmath.Point3f getPosition()
        Get the position in 3D Cartesian space of a generic device cursor, e.g., for a Wiimote its a X, Y, Z coordinate, for a mouse its the mouse cursor X and Y values, etc.
        Returns:
        X, Y, and Z coordinates of generic cursor.
